bio: WhiteRabbit is an independent film producer building a web 3 platform to facilitate the production process.
contributionDescription:
Sum Pictures is a Production Companyâ€¦ built on the Optimism network.

We are dedicated to crafting tailored solutions for today's content creators. Our driving force is the seamless integration of blockchain technology into the production process, empowering content creators and elevating the storytelling quality.

We believe in audience involvement in the filmmaking journey. Through interactive production dynamics, we invite our community to co-create films, ensuring impactful cinematic experiences.

Our ecosystem combines innovative financing, audience insights, pre-screening mechanisms, and strategic distribution. This convergence fuels collaboration between content creators and audiences, ushering in a new entertainment era marked by the potential of blockchain integration.

contributionLinks.description: Sum Pictures  gives the decision making power to creators and their audiences.

impactDescription:
We stand at a crossroads in the history of entertainment with unprecedented potential to propel the industry into new horizons.

At SUM PICTURES, we're committed to navigating this exciting landscape, driving innovation and pushing boundaries.


In the present landscape,

a mere handful of algorithm-driven executives

hold the power to grant projects the green light.

Sum Pictures

gives that power to creators and their audiences,

allowing them to decide which movies get made and how.

fundingSources.description: Provided to establish and grow the platform.

pwCategorySuggestions: Content Creation, Community Building, Blockchain Infrastructure
